definitions.definition: ( intransitive ) To bend down ; to stoop low ; to stand close to the ground with legs bent, like an animal when waiting for prey, or someone in fear.
examples: We crouched behind the low wall until the squad of soldiers had passed by.

definitions.definition: ( intransitive ) To bend servilely ; to bow in reverence or humility.

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To bend down ; to stoop low ; to stand close to the ground with legs bent, like an animal when waiting for prey, or someone in fear.
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive ) To bend servilely ; to bow in reverence or humility.

definitions.definition: To sign with the cross ; bless .

main_definition: ( obsolete ) To sign with the cross ; bless .
